meanings.definition: The act of discarding or getting rid of something, especially a vehicle, as scrap.
meanings.sent1: Many old cars were sent to scrappages to be recycled.
meanings.sent2: The government introduced a program to encourage scrappages of polluting vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The town's annual scrappages event turned into a fun competition.
meanings.sent4: His room was so cluttered that it looked like a scrappages yard.
meanings.sent5: The scrappages of the broken appliances created a sense of cleanliness and order.

meanings.definition: The amount of money offered as an incentive for scrapping an old vehicle and purchasing a new one.
meanings.sent1: The dealership provided a generous scrappages for trading in his old truck.
meanings.sent2: She decided to take advantage of the scrappages to upgrade her car.
meanings.sent3: The scrappages offered by the car manufacturer made him consider buying a new vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The scrappages deal was too good to pass up.
meanings.sent5: He saved up enough money to buy a new car thanks to the scrappages program.
